narratives.question_text: Were the resources available to you - library, fabrication labs, classroom, software, desk space, etc. adequate for the fulfillment of the assigned work?  If not, please make suggestions.
comments: Since blog was not easy to access, the system of share the idea there was not active. It would be better to shift to classes v2 because every student is used to use it.
Yes, books and computer programs were available.

The Haas library continues to be a frustrating resource for seminar work like this that requires a great deal of research. The one-book-one-day policy continues to be a struggle to work with. In the end I needed to borrow books from the personal collections of friends and colleagues in order to complete my assignments, with the advent of reduced library hours at Haas during finals weeks and the one-book check out policy. Without access to these personal collections I would not have been able to complete my work.
